data.eml:eml: A review of the Nearctic genus Prostoia (Ricker) (Plecoptera, Nemouridae), with the description of a new species and a surprising range extension for P. hallasi Kondratieff & Kirchner

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Grubbs, Scott A., Baumann, Richard W., DeWalt, R. Edward, Tweddale, Tari (2014): A review of the Nearctic genus Prostoia (Ricker) (Plecoptera, Nemouridae), with the description of a new species and a surprising range extension for P. hallasi Kondratieff & Kirchner. ZooKeys 401: 11-30, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.401.7299, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.401.7299
